Name: CORAA NURC-São Paulo Minimal Corpus
Description:
This is a manually annotated corpus of Brazilian Portuguese spoken in São Paulo.
The recordings were made between 1971 and 1977. In the corpus there are 21 audio files and audio-aligned multilevel transcripts according to linguistically motivated intonation units.
The corpus is available from PORTULAN.
Group: Corpora with transcriptions and audio recordings
